hero.name: Ishaq PaktinYar
hero.title: Software Engineer // Bioinformatics Researcher
hero.value_prop: Working on ML-driven prediction systems and backend services.

projects.title: BiTatlım Marketplace
projects.problem: Required a production-grade delivery platform with secure data handling and optimized logistics.
projects.contribution: Lead Developer; architected backend with Next.js/PostgreSQL and optimized routing via data telemetry.
projects.outcome: Mitigated cyber-attacks to secure 1,800+ user records and transitioned monitoring to predictive efficiency.

projects.title: Protein Function Prediction
projects.problem: Low precision in computational protein classification models at JRavi Lab.
projects.contribution: Engineered an ML pipeline using PyTorch and Self-Attention for sequence-to-function mapping.
projects.outcome: Increased classification accuracy from 86% to 98% while reducing computational costs by 30%.

projects.title: ClimatePulse Dashboard
projects.problem: Thesis: Integrating disparate environmental and meteorological datasets for health risk forecasting.
projects.contribution: Implemented TimesNet model for multivariate time-series forecasting and a RASA-powered chatbot.
projects.outcome: Achieved high-accuracy health risk forecasting across climate and air quality datasets.

experience.summary: Conducted applied ML research in computational biology, improving protein function prediction pipelines and developing species classification models.
key_impact: Improved protein function prediction accuracy from 86% to 98%
Demonstrated classical ML models rival PLMs with lower compute cost
Currently developing protein species classification models

experience.summary: Backend engineer in a startup environment, contributing to production-grade applications and data-driven platforms.
key_impact: Pushed a production-ready application to live environment
Developed backend API integrations and data pipelines
Collaborated in fast-paced startup team delivering real products

experience.summary: Led development of internal systems and data platforms supporting NGO operations and member analytics.
key_impact: Designed and deployed HR database system for staff and member tracking
Built member-facing analytics sub-platform with secure API integration
Contributed to NGO website and internal digital infrastructure

experience.summary: Worked on maintaining and extending production platforms for multiple business clients.
key_impact: Assisted teammates and mentored junior interns
